headline: Improves immunity
review: Lovely product. Improved my kids immunity. Initially she was not liking it because of the sour and spicy mix it had but later as we started giving her one spoon daily she started liking it. Don't think like if you have Chyawanprash your kids won't catch cold. They will catch cold for sure but their body will have the immunity to fight it. The cold will go off in days rather than a week it used to take earlier. Also they don't catch cold as frequently as they used to be

headline: so tiny
review:
Dabur Chyawanprash Awaleha -

It tastes good nevertheless this pack of 250gm looked like a joke. Came in such tiny packaging barely had 10 spoonful of Chyawanprash in it.
I had a good laugh!
No complaints about the product quality or delivery!

Top notch Ayurvedic Preparation if you wish to strengthen your body's defense mechanism and immunity. Buy a bigger pack is all I'd suggest.

~ The SilverLining Review ~
